languages.text: "Нет, оболочки", {n}— хриплый голос звучит упрямо.{/n} "Бытие человека превосходит бытие его оболочки, мы ясно видим это. Всегда есть что-то еще. Что-то, что кипит и сияет, к чему всегда тянется темный свет и злой голод".

"No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."
languages.original_text: "Нет, оболочки", {n}— хриплый голос звучит упрямо.{/n} "Бытие человека превосходит бытие его оболочки, мы ясно видим это. Всегда есть что-то еще. Что-то, что кипит и сияет, к чему всегда тянется темный свет и злой голод".

traits.locale_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «No, son cascarones». {n}La voz jadeante parece firme.{/n} «La existencia de un humano va más allá de la de su cascarón. Esto nos resulta obvio. Siempre hay algo más. Algo que brilla y resplandece, algo que la luz oscura y el hambre siempre persiguen».
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: «No, son cascarones». {n}La voz jadeante parece firme.{/n} «La existencia de un humano va más allá de la de su cascarón. Esto nos resulta obvio. Siempre hay algo más. Algo que brilla y resplandece, algo que la luz oscura y el hambre siempre persiguen».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「いいや、器だ」{n}しゃがれた声が毅然と答える。{/n}「人間の存在は器以上のもの。我々にとってそれは明確だ。常にそれ以上の何かがある。暗い光と邪悪な飢えが常に手を伸ばしている、ふつふつと煮えて輝きを放っている何かが」
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、器だ」{n}しゃがれた声が毅然と答える。{/n}「人間の存在は器以上のもの。我々にとってそれは明確だ。常にそれ以上の何かがある。暗い光と邪悪な飢えが常に手を伸ばしている、ふつふつと煮えて輝きを放っている何かが」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “不，肉体就是外壳。”{n}诺莫斯沙哑的声音听起来非常坚决。{/n}“我们很清楚，人的存在不仅仅是外壳的存在。还有更多的东西。还有某种会发光发热的东西，阴暗的光芒与邪恶的饥渴总想得到这些东西。”
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: “不，肉体就是外壳。”{n}诺莫斯沙哑的声音听起来非常坚决。{/n}“我们很清楚，人的存在不仅仅是外壳的存在。还有更多的东西。还有某种会发光发热的东西，阴暗的光芒与邪恶的饥渴总想得到这些东西。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Si, {n}répond la voix éraillée sur ton catégorique.{/n} L'existence d'un humain ne se limite pas à celle de son enveloppe, c'est une évidence. Il y a toujours quelque chose de plus. Quelque chose qui sourd, qui étincelle... et qui attire la lumière noire et la faim pernicieuse. »
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: « Si, {n}répond la voix éraillée sur ton catégorique.{/n} L'existence d'un humain ne se limite pas à celle de son enveloppe, c'est une évidence. Il y a toujours quelque chose de plus. Quelque chose qui sourd, qui étincelle... et qui attire la lumière noire et la faim pernicieuse. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Nein, sie sind Hüllen." {n}Die krächzende Stimme klingt äußerst beharrlich.{/n} "Die Existenz eines Menschen ist mehr als nur die Existenz seiner Hülle — das ist für uns offensichtlich. Es gibt immer noch etwas mehr. Etwas, das schimmert und glänzt, wonach das dunkle Licht und der böse Hunger ewig trachten."
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, sie sind Hüllen." {n}Die krächzende Stimme klingt äußerst beharrlich.{/n} "Die Existenz eines Menschen ist mehr als nur die Existenz seiner Hülle — das ist für uns offensichtlich. Es gibt immer noch etwas mehr. Etwas, das schimmert und glänzt, wonach das dunkle Licht und der böse Hunger ewig trachten."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Aksine öyledir." {n}Hışırtılı ses, kararlı bir tona bürünüyor.{/n} "Bir insanın varlığı, muhafazasının varlığından ibaret değildir. Bu kadarı bariz. Daima başka bir şey de olmuştur. Bu şey parlayıp ışıldar, karanlık ışık ve habis açlık da ona ulaşmaya çalışır."
languages.original_text: "No, they are shells." {n}The rasping voice sounds adamant.{/n} "A human's existence is more than the existence of its shell — this is obvious to us. There is always something more. Something that simmers and shines, for which the dark light and wicked hunger are always reaching."

traits.locale_text: "Aksine, öyledir." {n}Hışırtılı ses, kararlı bir tona bürünüyor.{/n} "Bir insanın varlığı, muhafazasının varlığından ibaret değildir. Bu kadarı bariz. Başka bir şey daima olmuştur. Bu şey parlayıp ışıldar, karanlık ışık ve habis açlık da ona ulaşmaya çalışır."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
